entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:47 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 06:01 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: E 35 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Wet snow changing to snow this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to wet snow in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
